PHRASE.LANG: Parte Superior de Bikini de Negocios
For the business woman who wants to look professional but not be uncomfortable in warmer climates![#Legal]
Pour les femmes d'affaires qui veulent rester professionnelles tout en profitant du soleil ![#Legal]
Für Business-Frauen, die sich auch in wärmeren Gefilden wohlfühlen und professionell aussehen wollen.[#Legal]
Per le donne in carriera che vogliono apparire professionali, pur senza essere scomode in climi più caldi![#Legal]
Para la mujer de negocios que quiere tener un aspecto profesional sin estar incómoda en los climas cálidos.[#Legal]
For the business woman who wants to look professional but not be uncomfortable in warmer climates![#Legal]
